attributes.action: Allow schools to continue performing Nativity plays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They are now saying that Nativity plays in our schools are racist. 
What next? Things are now getting really silly. There's me thinking Christmas was all about the birth of christ? 
Even if its all about santa to a lot of us, this is still taking away part of our Heritage, isn't it??

rejection.details: There is nothing to prevent such plays taking place.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
